customData.title: Custom Data
customData.description: A user defined set of custom data in the payload of the instance, used where the formal schema lacks required properties

entityInfo.title: Entity Info
entityInfo.description: A set of properties that describe this specific instance of the entity

schemaVersion.title: Schema Version
schemaVersion.description: The version number of the schema in use for this instance

createdBy.title: Created by
createdBy.description: The Participant responsible for the original creation of the entity

note.title: Notes
note.description: Arbitary note or comments about the entity
